annotations:
Good day,
AQUAVITA TONNAGE / MV VAN JAGUAR 60K DWT OPEN GANGAVARAM, INDIA 30-31 AUG 2024
MV VAN JAGUAR
BUILT 2015 (JMU, KURE SHIPYARD, JAPAN)
SD ST BC
LIBERIA FLAG
LR CLASS
60,263 MT DWT ON 12,936 M SSW, TPC 60.23
LOA 198 M / BEAM 32,26 M
GT/NR 34,311 / 19,757
5 HO / HA
77,239 CBM GRAIN 100 PCT TRIMMED END
72,354 CBM BALE 100 PCT TRIMMED END
4 X 30 TS CRANES WITH 4 X 12 CBM GRABS (SMAG TYPE)
A60 BULKHEAD / CO2 FITTED
SPEED / BUNKER
ABT 14 KN ON ABT 22.5 MT IFO – BALLAST
ABT 13.5 KN ON ABT 25 MT IFO – LADEN
ALL INCL AUX
PORT CONS ABT 3.0 MT IFO IDLE / ABT 5 MT IFO WORKING
ECO SPEED / BUNKER
ABT 12,0 KN ON ABT 18 MT IFO – LADEN
ABT 12,5 KN ON ABT 17 MT IFO – BALLAST
AT SEA OR PORT MGO 0.1MT PER DAY
THE WORD "ABT " IN SPEED AND CONSUMPTION REFERS TO AN ALLOWANCE OF MINUS 0.5KNTS ON SPEED AND PLUS 5% ON BUNKER CONSUMPTION RESPECTIVELY BOTH IN OWNERS FAVOR. THE AFORESAID SPEED/CONSUMPTION ARE BASIS GOOD WEATHER/SMOOTH SEA, UP TO MAX BF SC 4/DOUGLAS SEA STATE 3 (MAX 1,25M WAVE HEIGHT), NO ADVERSE CURRENTS, NO NEGATIVE INFLUENCE OF SWELL, EVEN KEEL CONDITION, AT THE CONDITION OF CLEAN BOTTOM IN OPEN, CALM AND DEEP SEA CONDITION WITH MINIMUM 48 HRS. STEAMING TIME. ANY GAIN ON TIME AND/OR CONSUMPTION TO BE OFF-SET AGAINST LOSS ON TIME AND/OR CONSUMPTION IF ANY. NO FAVORABLE WEATHER AND CURRENT FACTOR TO BE APPLIED WHEN EVALUATING VESSEL'S PERFORMANCE. NO EXTRAPOLATION ALLOWED FOR OTHER CONDITIONS THAN DESCRIBED ABOVE. 'GOOD WEATHER' PERIODS TO BE CONSIDERED PERIODS NOT SHORTER THAN 24 CONSECUTIVE HOURS FROM NOON TO NOON.
VESSEL SHALL HAVE LIBERTY OF USING ADDITIONAL FUEL OIL / LSMGO WHILST ENTERING AND LEAVING PORTS AND FOR EXCHANGE OF BALLAST, MANEUVERING IN SHALLOW WATERS, CHANNELS AND NARROW WATERWAYS, HOLD CLEANING OPERATIONS, POOR VISIBILITY, HEAVY TRAFFIC, WORKING WITH LOW LOAD, FREQUENT LOAD CHANGE, INCINERATOR, SHIFT OF GENERATOR ENGINES.
ALL DETAILS AND PERFORMANCE FIGURES ARE 'ABOUT'
AT ALL TIMES CHARTERERS TO SUPPLY HSFO 380CST WHICH TO BE AT LEAST IN ACCORDANCE WITH THE ISO 8217 : 2010 RMG 380 AND LSMGO 0.1% ISO8217:2010 DMA/MAX SULPHUR 0.1%
Best regards,
Eugene (Yevgen) Grechka
Aquavita International S.A.
Chartering manager
Mobile: +38-050-395-67-11 (whatsapp)
Direct:   +306970291600
Skype: grechkaeugene
Email: grechka@aquavitainternational.com
chartering@aquavitainternational.com
